description: Enterprise reporting table for contact specific title in Patient Education (PED) records.

columns.name: PED_ID
columns.description: The Unique ID for the Patient Education Record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: This is a numeric representation of the date of this encounter in your system. The integer portion of the number specifies the date of the encounter. The digits after the decimal point indicate multiple visits on one day.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: Line count for the Patient education contact specific title data.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The contact date in external format.

columns.name: CONTACT_TITLE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient education title for which the patient has received education.

columns.name: CNT_TITLE_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Category item that specifies the status of the title.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Active


N/A


Done


Deleted


Not Started


In Progress

columns.name: CNT_TITLE_EDU_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the education detail record that contains additional details about this title for this encounter.

columns.name: TITLE_WAS_SUG_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether this title was suggested by the EMR. Y indicates that this title was suggested by the EMR. N or null indicates that this title was not suggested by the EMR.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: TITLE_ADDED_FROM_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID for how this title was added to the patient's chart. This is usually the same as the internal ID. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Community ID (CID).


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Patient Education


Care Plan


Doc Flowsheet


Order


Order Set


Pathway


Task Template


Interface


Patient Assigned Task


Utility

columns.name: TITLE_ALT_CSN_ID
columns.description: If this title was added to the patient's chart based on a BestPractice Advisory, then this is the unique contact serial number of the alert (ALT) contact that is used to track the firing of that BestPractice Advisory. If this title was not added based on a BestPractice Advisory, then this is null.
